# totalCacheFolderSize

**Instance Property**

The total size of your application’s cache folder.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalCacheFolderSize: Measurement<UnitInformationStorage> { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this metric represents total size of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/URL/cachesDirectory].

Placing files in the appropriate directories, such as the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/URL/cachesDirectory] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/URL/temporaryDirectory], allows the system to manage and purge content when necessary, ensuring optimal disk space utilization and a better experience (see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/FileManagement/Conceptual/FileSystemProgrammingGuide/FileSystemOverview/FileSystemOverview.html]).

## Reading file sizes

- **totalBinaryFileSize**: The total size of disk space your app’s binary files occupy.
- **totalCloneSize**: The total size of all clone files that are attributed to your app.
- **totalDataFileSize**: The total size of disk space your app uses for storing data files.
